topic: 3. What is the normal order of activities in which traditional software testing is organized?
options: integration testing, system testing, unit testing, validation testing.
unit testing, validation testing, system testing, integration testing
unit testing, integration testing, validation testing, system testing
validation testing, system testing, integration testing, unit testing
topic_cn: 3. 传统软件测试通常按照什么顺序组织各项活动？
options_cn: 集成测试，系统测试，单元测试，确认测试。
单元测试，确认测试，系统测试，集成测试。
单元测试，集成测试，确认测试，系统测试。
确认测试，系统测试，集成测试，单元测试。
